## concat variable

Concatenates / multiplies given matrices in left-to-right order. A minimum of 2 input matrices must be given. If `out` is null, writes result into `a`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
concat: (out: import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec | null, a: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, b: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, ...xs: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>[]) => import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>
```
